body_html: Oh, can you run a rake rails:update and diff through the changes? I think it may have been skipped for 4.1 and I want to make sure we get all the new defaults. We can probably skip the use of secrets.yml for now since config/initializer/secret_token.rb is already setup securely – I can make the switch after this PR.

body: Oh, can you run a `rake rails:update` and diff through the changes? I think it may have been skipped for 4.1 and I want to make sure we get all the new defaults. We can probably skip the use of `secrets.yml` for now since `config/initializer/secret_token.rb` is already setup securely – I can make the switch after this PR.
